title: Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Guideline

changeLog.description: Updated recovery time objectives for critical systems.

content:
This guideline sets minimum requirements for business continuity and disaster recovery planning at NordSure Insurance.

Critical processes must be identified and documented. Recovery time objectives and recovery point objectives must be defined and tested annually.

Disaster recovery plans must cover cyber incidents, system outages, and physical disruptions.

Employees must be trained on continuity procedures. Test results must be documented and reported to senior management.

Failure to maintain effective continuity planning may result in regulatory action.
